thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Tasos Georgoulas
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Tasos Georgoulas

author: Tasos Georgoulas
title: Tasos Georgoulas
text: I am purchasing items from banggood for the last 7 months. Every ordered item was delivered fast in protective post packaging. The quality of their products is very good and decent. I highly recommend banggood because I've never had any issue with them and I have found many value for money products there.
